description: Try our easy to follow Comfort Food Chicken Cacciatore recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Comfort Food Chicken Cacciatore Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g hot hungarian salami, finely diced (or bacon)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large, nonstick frying pan on medium-high. Meanwhile, trim visible fat from chicken and cut into bite-size pieces. Sear the chicken on all sides until golden brown. Add salami (or bacon) and cook a further minute or two.

Add tinned tomatoes, tomato paste, grated carrot, oregano and chili flakes.Reduce heat to a simmer, stir occasionally for 3040 minutes to allow the sauce to thicken and reduce slightly. Ten minutes before serving, add the sliced black olives.To serve, sprinkle with parsley and a little parmesan cheese.
